item.title: Interactive Visualizations: Checkboxes
item.description: Outline Link to heading Introduction Library Imports Introduction Link to heading This short tutorial focuses on how to add checkboxes into visualizations and build user-interactivity. The goal of this tutorial is to provide you with guidance on how to build a plot that can update data in real-time based on user-input through checkboxes. Before following along this tutorial, make sure you have Python installed. If you do not have Python downloaded, you can look here and determine the version you need.
